idea-plugin.name: Kotlin Type Info
idea-plugin.description: Show fully resolved (substituted) type information for Kotlin expressions. Unlike the built-in Type Info action, this inlines actual resolved types instead of showing generic signatures. Example: hovering over map in listOf("a").map { it.length } shows fun Iterable<String>.map(transform: (String) -> Int): List<Int> instead of the generic signature. Usage: Bind the action "Show Resolved Type Info" to a key (e.g., gH in IdeaVim).

action.description: Show fully resolved type information with substituted type parameters
